resources.string: Waiting for the previous action to finish…
Couldn\'t connect to Steam servers. Check your mobile data or Wi-Fi connection.
You are logged in elsewhere. Log out from Steam on your other devices.
You are not connected. Enable data or Wi-Fi connection.
Your account is suspended by the Steam Support.
Account already exists on this device. Remove the account in your device settings if you wish to update your password. Your screenshots will not be deleted.

A security code was sent to the email address associated with your account at %1$s.
Enter the code below to log in.

Check your spam folder if you can't find it in your inbox folder.
If you can't find the message, contact Steam Support.
Enter your Steam login details.\nYou will be logged out on your other devices.

Your login information will be sent only to Steam servers and nowhere else. On this device, a login key - not your password - will be stored, and you\'ll be able to remove the account in your device settings (your screenshots will not be deleted).
This account is corrupted. Remove it in your device settings. Your screenshots will not be deleted.
Press the "Add account" button on the action bar to begin.
Hold your screenshot keys for a screenshot.
Delete the screenshot from this device?

You don't have any screenshots.

Press your Home button, launch a game and take screenshots by holding down your device screenshot keys (usually Volume Down + Power).

An uncompressed copy of the screenshot will be saved in your device default screenshots folder.
Delete selected screenshots from this device?
Delete selected screenshot from this device?
Select a game from the left.
Couldn\'t log in to Steam. It\'s possible that your login key has expired. Try to remove your account in your device settings and add it again. Your screenshots will not be deleted.
